tha-ap25:4.2: dippati → dippeti (bj); dibbati (mr) | sāsanaṃ → jinasāsanaṃ (bj, pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap25:9.3: Yaṃ desaṃ → yaṃ yaṃ desaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed) | upapajjāmi → upagacchāmi (bj)
tha-ap25:15.3: Hasakhiḍḍasamaṅgīhaṃ → hāsakhiḍḍāsamaṃgīnaṃ (bj); sāyaṃ khiḍḍāsamaṅgīhaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed); sahassakhiḍḍasamaṅgīhaṃ (pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap25:25.1: Sammā dhammaṃ bhāvetvāna → mamopamaṃ karitvāna (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1)
